snippet.title: Rogue Tower Trailer
snippet.description:
Rogue Tower is a tower defense game with roguelike elements and a continuously expanding path which you can influence. Unlock, build, upgrade, expand, defend.

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1843760/Rogue_Tower/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB

Join the Die of Death Community!
Discord: https://discord.gg/2brzHhh6k9
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DieOfDeathGames
